oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interview with Maḥmūd Mūsá Kāyid
مقابلة مع محمود موسى كايد
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Muḥammad, Prophet, 571-633--Biography
Muḥammad, Prophet, 571-632--Ethics
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: Burghul; Children; Customs and traditions; Education; Farmers; Hardship; Homeland; Hospitality; Love; Mothers; Muḥammad, Prophet, 571-633; Parents; Passing on memories; Socio-economic conditions; Abraha; Abū Ṭālib ʻAbd Manāf ibn ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib, approximately 540-approximately 619; Birds; Childbirth; Churches; Elephants; God; Hospitality; Light; Mecca (Saudi Arabia); Morality; Orphans; Poetry; Quraysh (Arab tribe); Respect; Rocks; Shepherds; ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim, approximately 500-579; Abū Bakr, Caliph, -634; Abū Ṭālib ʻAbd Manāf ibn ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib, approximately 540-approximately 619; Arab unity; Caves; Children; Christians; Conspiracy; Customs and traditions; Dignity; Education; Enemies; Expulsion from Palestine; Gabriel (Archangel); Generations; God; Hagar (Biblical figure); Immigration; Islamic missionary; Jews; Khadījah, -approximately 619; Marriage; Medina (Saudi Arabia); Morality; Muḥammad, Prophet, 571-633; Murder; Muslims; Patience; Priests; Protection; Qurʼān; Religious belief; Ṣaḥābah; Schools; Torture; Trade; Victory; Waraqah ibn Nawfal, -approximately 611; Women; Zionist occupation; Abū Bakr, Caliph, -634; Ansar; Atheists; Caves; Generosity; Hospitality; Immigration; Jesus Christ; Jews; Maliciousness; Mary, Blessed Virgin, Saint; Morality; Muslims; Negus, -630 or 631; Protection; Quraysh (Arab tribe); Ṭalaʻa al-badru ʻalaynā
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded in 1995 with Maḥmūd Mūsá Kāyid, male, born in 1912 in Lūbyā, Palestine and resides in al-Baddāwī Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع محمود موسى كايد عام 1995، ذكر، ولد عام 1912 في لوبيا، فلسطين و يقيم في مخيم البداوي للاجئين، لبنان.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Attempt of demolishing Kaʻbah and birth of prophet Muḥammad. (@ 11:18)
oai_dc:dc.dc:tocAR: محاولة هدم الكعبة وولادة النبي محمد. (@ 11:18)
